alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:05PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Huerfano and northwestern Las Animas Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 604 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of La Veta to 6 miles northeast of Aguilar. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. A Flash Flood Warning remains in effect for portions of the region. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walsenburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
